posts.title: HEXO Username&password Forced Solution
posts.text: Today morning I got an idea that maybe I can change my blogâ€™s theme to something good-looking, so I looked at a theme that makes me happy with it. And I cloned it into my blog and when I was trying to make it work, problems show.1 I canâ€™t Hexo g -d directly because of some access problem.2 I must type in my Github username&password every when I type hexo g -d.Error: Permission denied (publickey). fatal: Could not read from remote repository.Solution:First, Generate publickey for root: sudo ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "your mailbox", the corresponding path is /var/root/.sshThen, Extract the public key information and configure it to github. The problem is again, the root folder under / var is not accessible in the UI interface. We can bypass this problem by sudo cat /var/root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub. And, all is well. Thx to this blog
When I wrote down this words, Itâ€™s 23:13, I donâ€™t know

posts.title: nomoreicant
posts.text: itâ€™s a good begining that all we can do just walk around in our home. Looking at the dark night sky and counting our shining stars.I bought a camera that cost all my money, I have my dreams that is standing so high, which I canâ€™t touch them then.I wanna make things back to the past, to the moment when we are a child, standing in there,over hill and dale was glass, behand your head the sky was dark blue and the parents were youngâ€¦Somebody often forgot where they are from then where they wanna go, they just follow the direction people forward.I wanna say something to the boy who got his dreams in arms,do not forget the feelings when you find a thing you like, do not get involved in others thought, maybe uh-huh,they are right in some ways,but you canâ€™t be influnced by these guys. And, you can stay the point where you are,but you canâ€™t just stay there all the time.

posts.title: Good night
posts.text: Now itâ€™s a big mistake I have made just now, I wanna to be a better myself, donâ€™t know where to start? Follow me.

posts.title: It's been a long time...
posts.text: Itâ€™s been a long time no posts on Hexo, itâ€™s like a freshmanâ€™s gone in a blink of an eye. I donâ€™t knnow what I did in the half year, actually, this is not what I want, I canâ€™t spend my life like this. especially college. I should learn, try, afraid of nothing at all. So, come on man.

posts.title: Right here
posts.text: Write down some tips about for loop. 123456789101112131415161718192021#include<stdio.h>int main(){int T,flag=0;scanf("%d", &T);while(T--){if(flag==1) printf("\n");else flag=1;int n,i,j;scanf("%d", &n);for(i=1; i<=n; i++){for(j=i; j<=8; j++)printf("%d*%d=%d ", i,j,i*j);//è¿™ä¸ªåˆ†å·ç»“æŸå±äºä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªforçš„èŒƒç•´printf("%d*%d=%d\n", i,j,i*j);//è¿™ä¸ªè¯­å¥ä¸ä¼šè¢«å¾ªç¯}}return 0;} okâ€¦.Come on! little fish.

posts.title: 2019 Hello This Another Blog's Begining La
posts.text: There are just four days to start school, summarize the summer vacation in this lifeâ€¦..What have I done this summer? Time123456After the college entrance examination, waiting for the resultsChose my favorite university and majorWent to Guangzhou for a summer workCame back...(League of legends)Mac os Mojave installingThen, the hexo If you also wanna make a static blog by using Hexo+GitHub win or mac, which is a easy way to make it, here is the link Iâ€™ve followed. If reproduced, please indicate the source. About senior high schoolâ€™s lifeTwo classes, a older boy which was my hole senior high life.Goodbye guys, goodbye my friend, say goodbye to my&our youth. Move forwardWhatever the life gave you, if you couldnâ€™t accept it, and then you can only choose to change it, whatever, just do what you wanna do&save.
